name: Helium Skies
description:
Imagine a place where you can do nothing but float around. Imagine flying in that space, going higher and lower, left and right and fly wherever you want to fly.

Helium Skies is a casual indie game where the player controls a small airplane with a goal to collect all the helium molecules in every level. The airplane can go in basic directions, but the part that is most fun is doing trick in the sky - loops, barrel rows and whatever you can think of! Collect all the molecules to pass all levels and finish the game.
